TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WSHttpBindingBase extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences
Public MustInherit Class WSHttpBindingBase Inherits Binding Implements IBindingRuntimePreferences
public ref class WSHttpBindingBase abstract : System::ServiceModel::Channels::Binding, System::ServiceModel::Channels::IBindingRuntimePreferences
type WSHttpBindingBase = class inherit Binding interface IBindingRuntimePreferences

summary.span: 提供成員通用於 和 的基底類別 (Base Class)。

span.span: Provides the base class with members common to the and the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供一些用來設定安全性、可靠、互通 Web 服務所使用之繫結的基本功能，例如 針對非雙工服務合約的實作，還有特別針對支援 WS-Federation 通訊協定所實作的安全與互通 。The provides some basic functionality for the bindings used to configure secure, reliable, and interoperable Web services, such as that implemented by the for non-duplex service contracts, and more particularly, for the secure and interoperable that supports the WS-Federation protocol. 根據預設，它會產生使用 WS-Security 訊息安全性和驗證、HTTP 訊息傳遞以及 Text/XML 訊息編碼的執行階段堆疊。By default it generates a run-time stack that uses WS-Security for message security and authentication, HTTP for message delivery, and a Text/XML message encoding. 它也可以設定使用 WS-ReliableMessaging 加強可靠性。It can be configured to also use WS-ReliableMessaging for reliability. 您可以使用選擇性的 `reliableSessionEnabled` 參數，設定是否要使用 WS-ReliableMessaging。The use of WS-ReliableMessaging is configurable using the optional `reliableSessionEnabled` parameter. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用具有衍生類別 ( 和 ) 的 類別所提供的功能。The following example shows how to use the functionality provided by the class with the derived classes, and . [!code-csharp[WSHttpBindingBase#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wshttpbindingbase/cs/service.cs#0)] [!code-vb[WSHttpBindingBase#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wshttpbindingbase/vb/service.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BypassProxyOnLocal { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.BypassProxyOnLocal : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出是否對本機位址略過 Proxy 伺服器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to bypass the proxy server for local addresses.

value.span: 若要對本機位址略過 Proxy 伺服器，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to bypass the proxy server for local addresses; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果網際網路資源有本機位址，則此資源為本機資源。An Internet resource is local if it has a local address. 本機位址是指所在的同一部電腦、 本機 LAN 或內部網路，而且會識別語法上沒有句號 （.），例如 Uri " http://webserver/ " 和 " http://localhost/ "。A local address is one that is on same computer, the local LAN or intranet and is identified, syntactically, by the lack of a period (.) as in the URIs "http://webserver/" and "http://localhost/". 設定 屬性即可決定以 設定的端點在存取本機資源時，是否使用 Proxy 伺服器。Setting the property determines whether endpoints configured with the use the proxy server when accessing local resources. 若 為 `true`，則對於本機網際網路資源的要求不會使用 Proxy 伺服器。If is `true`, requests to local Internet resources do not use the proxy server. 若 為 `false`，則所有的網際網路要求都會經過 Proxy 伺服器。When is `false`, all Internet requests are made through the proxy server. ## Examples 下列範例會將這個屬性設為表示應略過本機資源的 Proxy。The following example sets this property to indicate that the proxy should be bypassed for local resources. [!code-csharp[WSHttpBindingBase#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wshttpbindingbase/cs/service.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WSHttpBindingBase#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wshttpbindingbase/vb/service.vb#3)] 這個屬性的值也可以在組態檔中設定。The value of this property can also be set in the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繫結項目的順序很重要。The order of the binding elements is important. 它會反映建構及堆疊通訊協定和傳輸通道的順序。It reflects the order in which the protocol and transport channels are constructed and stacked. ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何取得訊息的大小上限。This example shows how to get the maximum size for a message. MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxBufferPoolSize { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaxBufferPoolSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定配置供訊息緩衝區管理員使用的最大記憶體量 (以位元組為單位)，緩衝區管理員管理使用此繫結之端點所需緩衝區。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory allocated, in bytes, for the buffer manager that manages the buffers required by endpoints using this binding.

value.span: 使用此繫結設定之端點所使用緩衝區集區的大小上限，單位為位元組。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, for the pool of buffers used by an endpoint configured with this binding.

value.span: 預設值為 524,288 個位元組。

span.span: The default value is 524,288 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會嘗試利用緩衝集區將使用緩衝區的成本降至最低。The tries to minimize the cost of using buffers with a buffer pool. 當訊息從通道送出時，服務將需要緩衝區來處理訊息。Buffers are required to process messages by the service when they come out of the channel. 如果緩衝區集區中沒有足夠的記憶體可以處理訊息負載， 就必須從 CLR 堆積配置額外的記憶體，進而增加記憶體回收負荷。If there is not sufficient memory in the buffer pool to process the message load, the must allocate additional memory from the CLR heap, which increases the garbage collection overhead. 從 CLR 記憶體回收堆積所產生的大量配置表示緩衝區集區太小，而提高 上限來提供較大的配置便可改善效能。Extensive allocation from the CLR garbage heap is an indication that the buffer pool size is too small and that performance can be improved with a larger allocation by increasing the limit. ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何取得 值。This example shows how to get the value. [!code-csharp[WSHttpBindingBase#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wshttpbindingbase/cs/service.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WSHttpBindingBase#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wshttpbindingbase/vb/service.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxReceivedMessageSize { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaxReceivedMessageSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定可由繫結處理之訊息的大小上限 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, for a message that can be processed by the binding.

value.span: 由此繫結處理之訊息的大小上限，單位為位元組。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, for a message that is processed by the binding.

value.span: 預設值為 65,536 位元組。

span.span: The default value is 65,536 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服務可使用 從網路收到的訊息大小受限於配置給各訊息的記憶體量，The size of the messages that can be received on the wire by services using the is bounded by the amount of memory allocated for each message. 這項關於訊息大小的限制是為了避免受到阻絕服務 (DoS) 攻擊。This bound on message size is intended to limit exposure to denial of service (DoS) attacks. ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何取得訊息的大小上限。This example shows how to get the maximum size for a message [!code-csharp[WSHttpBindingBase#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wshttpbindingbase/cs/service.cs#7)] [!code-vb[WSHttpBindingBase#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wshttpbindingbase/vb/service.vb#7)]

span.span: The value is less than zero.

exception.span: 訊息超出所配置的大小上限。

span.span: A message exceeded the maximum size allocated.

summary.span: 取得或設定 SOAP 訊息複雜性的條件約束，而這些條件約束可由以此繫結所設定的端點處理。

span.span: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.

value.span: 指定複雜性條件約束的 。

span.span: The that specifies the complexity constraints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複雜性條件約束的包含項目，包括最大項目深度，或是訊息內的最大字串內容長度。The complexity constraints include items like a maximum element depth, a maximum length for string content within the message. 這些條件約束可以防止嘗試使用訊息複雜性困住端點處理資源的阻絕服務 (DoS) 攻擊類別。The constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DoS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何取得訊息的大小上限。This example shows how to get the maximum size for a message. [!code-csharp[WSHttpBindingBase#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wshttpbindingbase/cs/service.cs#10)] [!code-vb[WSHttpBindingBase#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wshttpbindingbase/vb/service.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個值是 `true` 且 不是 `null`，則代表有錯誤。It is an error for this to be `true` and to be non-`null`. ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何取得訊息的大小上限。This example shows how to get the maximum size for a message.
